abstract: Columnist David Pogue offers quick impressions of the new G1 cellphone from Google, HTC and T-Mobile.

lead_paragraph: From our colleague David Pogue on his Pogue’s Posts blog:

headline.main: David Pogue’s First Look at the Google Phone
